Video deleted successfully.. Status Image Saved successfully..D Status Video Saved successfully..D WhatsApp status photos not found. WhatsApp status videos not found. Saved WhatsApp photos not found. Saved WhatsApp videos not found. Status already saved.. WhatsApp Statuses Saved Statuses Something Went Wrong.. How To Use App? How to use Status Saver?

1. Check the recently uploaded status by your friends on WhatsApp.

2. Open Status Saver app and Select START tab from home page.

3. Select PHOTOS or VIDEOS tab.

4. Click on photo or video status for full screen preview.

5. On top of the screen click on Repost, Share or Download button.

6. Once you click on Download button your status will be save in your phone storage(Inside \"Status Saver\" folder).

7. Now if you want to Repost, Share or Delete status then you will make it happen from SAVED tab.

Invalid file format Choose country code and enter number with your message and send Enter phone number here Send Message Save Contact WhatsApp Direct Chat Choose country code & enter number with your message and send Type Message... Empty number Please enter phone number Please install latest update for WhatsApp to begin Error while encoding your text message How to WhatsApp Direct?

Many times you wish to message in WhatsApp to unknown number whose number you don\'t want to save, Our App is place where you can directly send message to those numbers without saving.

1. Choose country code

2. Type number

3. Type message

4. Click on Send Message button to send message on WhatsApp.
